content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE 158: Tawanchai vs. Larsen*** was a [combat sports](/wiki/Combat_sports) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on June 3, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Strawweight Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Strawweight_World_Championship) bout between current two-time champion [Joshua Pacio](/wiki/Joshua_Pacio) and [Jarred Brooks](/wiki/Jarred_Brooks) was originally expected to headline the event. However, Brooks withdrew with injury. They are now to headline at [ONE 164](/wiki/ONE_164) on December 3. A featherweight muay thai bout between [Tawanchai P.K. Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym) and [Niclas Larsen](/wiki/Niclas_Larsen) was promoted to the main event status. In the co-main event, a bantamweight bout between [Kwon Won Il](/wiki/Kwon_Won_Il) and [Fabrício Andrade](/wiki/Fabr%C3%ADcio_Andrade) took place at the event, who is next for a ONE bantamweight title. A heavyweight kickboxing bout between [Rade Opačić](/wiki/Rade_Opa%C4%8Di%C4%87) and [Guto Inocente](/wiki/Guto_Inocente) took place at this event. The pairing was previously scheduled to meet at [ONE 157](/wiki/ONE_157), but the bout was postponed to this event due to Inocente tested positive for [COVID-19](/wiki/COVID-19). ## Results Main Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFeatherweight Muay Thai[Tawanchai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym)def.[Niclas Larsen](/wiki/Niclas_Larsen)KO (punch)21:42Bantamweight[Fabrício Andrade](/wiki/Fabr%C3%ADcio_Andrade)def.[Kwon Won-il](/wiki/Kwon_Won_Il)KO (body kick)11:02FlyweightReece McLarendef.Xie WeiSubmission (rear-naked choke)13:42Flyweight[Kairat Akhmetov](/wiki/Kairat_Akhmetov)def.Tatsumitsu WadaDecision (unanimous)35:00Heavyweight Kickboxing[Guto Inocente](/wiki/Guto_Inocente)def.[Rade Opačić](/wiki/Rade_Opa%C4%8Di%C4%87)KO (punch to the body)12:33Strawweight[Alex Silva](/wiki/Alex_Silva_(fighter))def.Adrian MattheisSubmission (heel hook)13:34Lead Card (YouTube / Watch ONE)FlyweightGurdarshan Mangatdef.Yodkaikaew FairtexDecision (split)35:00Lightweight Kickboxing[Constantin Rusu](/wiki/Constantin_Rusu)def.[Marouan Toutouh](/wiki/Marouan_Toutouh)Decision (unanimous)35:00Heavyweight[Marcus Almeida](/wiki/Marcus_Almeida)def.Simon CarsonTKO (punches)12:24HeavyweightOdie Delaneydef.Mehdi BarghiSubmission (straight armlock)22:22HeavyweightJasur Mirzamukhamedovdef.Duke DidierDecision (split)35:00Women's AtomweightJenelyn Olsimdef.Julie MerzabarbaDecision (split)35:00LightweightEdson Marquesdef.Kim Kyung-lockDecision (unanimous)35:00 ## Bonus awards The following fighters were awarded bonuses: - **$50,000 Performance of the Night: Alex Silva, Fabricio Andrade** and **[Tawanchai P.K.Saenchai](/wiki/Tawanchai_P.K._Saenchaimuaythaigym)** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
